title: RoadMovie 1.8 [UB K'ed].zip
description:
WHAT'S NEW
1.8

Chapters can now be added incrementally using a time range and a popup menu.
Chapters can now be exported to a text file.
Chapters can now be imported from a text file.
Added the FeedbackReporter framework by Torsten Curdt.
[BUGFIX] Chapters and Tracks scrollviews are finally working as expected.
[BUGFIX] Track languages are now correctly detected and set upon import.
[BUGFIX] Multiple tracks can now be deleted at once.
[BUGFIX] Found and fixed a couple of small memory leaks.
[BUGFIX] Updated all Turbo.264 Presets for better compatibility.

REQUIREMENTS
Mac OS X 10.5 or later.

[K'ed] by [K]ambing '09
